scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script (for the main text and for the commentary) of the second half of the 16th century. Apparently written by Ya῾aḳov ben Mordekhai Pogeṭṭi: inscribed in the colophon of the preceding part, Add MS 27041, folio 241r.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Moses Cordovero. Or Yakar. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,042.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 148: his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153): inscribed, [221v] (fse002v).
